entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
